title: AI Ethics & Security
content:
Ethical Frameworks

  • Fairness: Definitions, metrics, mitigation strategies
  • Transparency: Explainability, interpretability
  • Privacy: Differential privacy, federated learning
  • Safety: Robustness, alignment

Societal Impact

  • Bias: Sources, measurement, mitigation
  • Access: Democratizing AI technologies
  • Labor Impact: Automation and workforce changes

Adversarial Machine Learning

  • Attack Vectors: Evasion, poisoning, privacy attacks
  • Defenses: Adversarial training, certified robustness
  • Evaluation: Security metrics and benchmarks

Trustworthy AI

  • Robustness: Performance under distribution shift
  • Safety: Preventing harmful outputs
  • Privacy: Protecting sensitive information

Resources

AI/ML paper explanations - Ethics and security research, fairness metrics, and privacy techniques
